channel.title: Paula Dukure on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Paula Dukure on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Celebration
item.description: Ring ring, wake up princess, this is your day Watch your left foot when you jump out of bed Turn on your smile and show your beautiful eyes For everyone is counting years of your age It’s just another day of the year, we will celebrate You should go get a cake It’s just another day of the year, we will celebrate No matter what’s your age All around, friends are all around This is your day, you should celebrate All around, friends are all around So loud and louder every year, scream hurray!

item.title: Look In The Mirror
item.description: All of us have the same goal To drive the road that makes us call man pleased There’s an illusion we believe in That our happiness can be taken away Open up to what is now Take a clear look at what’s going on Is there a reason to smile Or is it time to change for the better? If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror I know I don’t have to wait long Till I’ll be free from this need To have something that gives me relief I’m learning to love life as it is Waiting for the perfect lover Who will come and make my grief go away But I know it’s too much to ask I’ll just deal with my demons alone If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror If you wanna see who can make you happy Look in the mirror I know I don’t have to wait long Till I’ll be free from this need To have something that gives me relief I’m learning to love I know I don’t have to wait long Till I’ll be free from this need To have something that gives me relief I’m learning to love life as it is Ooh yeah yeah… Till I’ll be free from this need I’m learning to love, I’m learning to love I know I don’t have to wait long I’m learning to love (Life as it is)
